TopicTitle: Unity 4.x and earlier no longer available

Articles.Content:
So i've moved my system to a new machine, the problem is that i can't DL a version of unity compatible with KSP part tools, how are folks getting around this?

Sry, it was a briwser issue, tried to acess the site on another computer and the tabs at the top of table appearred and i was able to access 4.2.2

Edited September 21, 2015 by PB666
I downloaded it a while ago without problems, the archives are over here: https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive You just need 4.2.2 anyway.

I downloaded it a while ago without problems, the archives are over here: https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive You just need 4.2.2 anyway.

I did get the DL but then got a page error on the licensing stuff

Well finally, 2 days later logged in in and managed to get to a valid Email sign in page.

Edited September 24, 2015 by PB666
